meanings.definition: The process of changing form or shape.
meanings.sent1: The caterpillar's morphoses into a butterfly amazed the children.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the morphoses of the landscape in his painting.
meanings.sent3: The morphoses of the clay into different animals made the pottery class fun.
meanings.sent4: Her journey through life was a series of morphoses, each one shaping her into who she is today.
meanings.sent5: The morphoses of the tadpole into a frog was like a magical transformation before our eyes.

meanings.definition: A series of changes or transformations.
meanings.sent1: The morphoses of the seasons from winter to spring bring new life to the forest.
meanings.sent2: The morphoses of technology over the years have revolutionized how we communicate.
meanings.sent3: The morphoses of the caterpillar into a butterfly is nature's beautiful magic show.
meanings.sent4: The morphoses of the city skyline at sunset was a breathtaking sight.
meanings.sent5: The morphoses of the caterpillar into a butterfly symbolizes growth and change in life.
